channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #th @ 1523513028695957504
item.description:
จากการลงพื้นที่ของ @email2kittisak บ๊อบ กิตติศักดิ์ ผู้สมัคร #นายกเมืองพัทยาจาก #คณะก้าวหน้า ได้เก็บข้อมูลปัญหาความเดือดร้อนของประชาชนชาวพัทยา แล้วทำเป็นข้อมูล GIS เปิดเป็น #Opendata ให้ทุกฝ่ายได้มีส่วนร่วมเสนอแนวทางพัฒนาเมืองพัทยาในย่านต่างๆ ดูและโหลดที่
https://t.co/CywD7UV9Fz https://t.co/4UOncQ843q

item.description: 🧵 #COVID19mx Como solo tendremos actualizaciones de datos abiertos una vez por semana, habrá que analizar los datos por fecha de inicio de síntomas, omitiendo las últimas 2 semanas (por información incompleta) para casos confirmados... https://t.co/BXtn6jyUyi

item.title: #fr @ 1523286928937824257

item.title: #de @ 1522996179684175874
item.description: Klingt nach "die Politik setzt auch hier auf Eigenverantwortung". Dann muss man aber den Menschen Zahlen und Fakten zur Verfügung stellen #OpenData. Was gibt es für verzögerte Folgen einer Covid Infektion, wieviel LC? V.a. LC ist kein psychisches Problem (junger Frauen). https://t.co/bNMqQ5R7BK

item.title: #es @ 1522978464772538368
item.description: 📢 150 mil vacunas de AstraZeneca que vencían el 30 de abril no fueron utilizadas. Así lo demuestra una revisión de cifras de la Plataforma Nacional de Datos Abiertos y advertencias de vencimiento reportadas por la Contraloría. 🧵 https://t.co/AnHsR0GOQ4

item.title: #nl @ 1522958542071902209
item.description:
Denk niet dat die Russen het heel erg waarderen dat de locaties van al hun eenheden plus geschatte slagkracht gewoon te downloaden zijn als open data. Dit zijn heel veel details.
Van de Oekraïners is - logisch - alleen de locatie van het hoofdkwartier per eenheid beschikbaar.

item.title: #en @ 1522834863593820162
item.description: Russian authorities are sending conscripts from occupied Crimea to the war against Ukraine. Acc. to the Permanent Rep of 🇺🇦 President in Crimea Tamila Tasheva, only open data show at least 72 military funerals in Crimea recently, of which 41 were from the peninsula — @UKRINFORM

item.title: #en @ 1522586917744910336
item.description:
Open data can make research more publicly accessible and accountable - often associated w quant datasets.
It can be trickier to make qual datasets publicly available (risks to participant privacy, etc).
We've been experimenting w an open data QUAL project @redetranscanada:

item.title: #es @ 1522586781228711936
item.description: “La información que genera el sistema de contrataciones públicas debe estar a disposición de la ciudadanía en formatos abiertos y reutilizables. 6/8

item.title: #pt @ 1522357729280548865
item.description:
Integridade, transparência, dados abertos, acesso à informação, participação social, governança pública, transformação digital e combate à corrupção.
Dá pra fomentar tudo isso, de uma só vez, e em municípios espalhados por todo o país? 👇

item.title: #en @ 1522337320569090048
item.description:
1) many osf pages were still private. Though access was requested, it was rarely given. This doesn't seem like open data.
2) one study have scripts, and when trying to recreate the results there were very different results.
What are the best ways forward?

item.title: #en @ 1522337046265798656
item.description:
I assigned my students to go to Psych Science (last 3 years) and pick a study with open data. Then run the authors' analyses and see if they can reproduce them.
Everyone seemed to enjoy it! Most cases everything was fine would recommend for other methods classes!
2 issues: 1/2
